meanings.definition: A conference or other meeting for discussion or training.
meanings.sent1: During the seminars, experts shared valuable insights with the audience.
meanings.sent2: I attended several seminars on leadership skills last month.
meanings.sent3: The seminars were so engaging that even the sleepy participants perked up.
meanings.sent4: The seminars acted as a beacon of knowledge in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The seminars were like a treasure trove of wisdom waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A class at a college or university in which a topic is discussed by a teacher and a small group of students.
meanings.sent1: In the seminars, the professor encouraged active participation from the students.
meanings.sent2: The psychology seminars were always thought-provoking and insightful.
meanings.sent3: During the seminars, the students' enthusiasm was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The seminars were a garden where knowledge bloomed in the minds of students.
meanings.sent5: The seminars painted a vivid picture of the subject matter for the students.
